title: Resume Parsing
synopsis: Package for extracting structured data from candidate resume Pdfs. Converts floating character encodings to labelled field/value pairs. Currently live at Rezi.ai (Seoul)
notes: Leverages spatial, formatting and semantic information to detect field types and build into structured JSON payload
Optimisation submodule implements recursive learning for continuous improvement while minimising development time
Input agnostic structure ensures workability for a broad range of resume formats
Built for lightweight deployment on a microservices framework like GCP/AWS Lambda
